title: The life of the renowned Peter D'Aubusson, Grand Master of Rhodes containing those two remarkable sieges of Rhodes by Mahomet the Great and Solyman the Magnificent, being lately added to compleat the story adorn'd with the choicest occurences in the Turkish Empire at that time.
author: Bouhours, Dominique, 1628-1702.
publisher: Printed for Geo. Wells and Sam. Carr ...,
notes: Written by Dominique Bouhours.  Cf. Wing.
Translation of: Histoire de Pierre d'Aubusson.
Caption and running title: The history of Peter D'Aubusson.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Also reissued with variant title page as The History of the Turkish War (Wing B3842D).
